name: scribe-css-build
description: Build tools for Scribe ESP32-C3 Thermal Printer CSS

scripts.build: npx @tailwindcss/cli --input ./src/css/index.css --output ./data/css/index.min.css --minify && npx @tailwindcss/cli --input ./src/css/diagnostics.css --output ./data/css/diagnostics.min.css --minify && npx @tailwindcss/cli --input ./src/css/settings.css --output ./data/css/settings.min.css --minify && npx @tailwindcss/cli --input ./src/css/404.css --output ./data/css/404.min.css --minify && cp node_modules/alpinejs/dist/cdn.min.js data/js/vendor-temp.js && cat node_modules/@simonwep/pickr/dist/pickr.min.js >> data/js/vendor-temp.js && npx terser src/js/config.js src/js/shared.js -c -m >> data/js/vendor-temp.js && cp data/js/vendor-temp.js data/js/vendor.min.js && rm data/js/vendor-temp.js && npx terser src/js/config.js src/js/index-alpine-store.js --compress --mangle --output data/js/page-index.min.js && npx terser src/js/settings-alpine-store.js src/js/settings-api.js --compress --mangle --output data/js/page-settings.min.js && npx terser src/js/diagnostics-alpine-store.js --compress --mangle --output data/js/page-diagnostics.min.js && npx terser src/js/404-alpine-store.js --compress --mangle --output data/js/page-404.min.js
